LifeArt - AI Hairstyle Try On

Welcome to LifeArt, the innovative AI-driven art generator designed to transform your selfies into stunning portraits and let you experiment with hairstyles like never before! This app provides a unique blend of creativity and fun, allowing users to explore and create their ideal looks.

LifeArt is available for free with in-app purchases. Subscription services vary by country and provide access to premium features. Payments will be charged to your iTunes Account upon purchase confirmation, with automatic renewals unless canceled 24 hours before the period ends.
